notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: E.K.S.L., D.H.M. and C.A.R. designed the research; E.K.S.L. and D.H.M. performed the data analyses; A.C.H. and I.G.B. generated the influenza virus data; E.K.S.L., D.H.M. and C.A.R. wrote the first draft of the paper. All authors contributed to the critical review and revision of the paper.
